dcterms:creator: M. Wydmuch
M. Kempka
W. Ja´skowski
dcterms:description: The ViZDoom learning environment provides an interface to train RL agents in the Doom environment, based on visual input (image pixels) similar to what a human player would see. The 'Deathmatch' scenario rewards the agent for killing continuously spawning enemies, presenting challenges such as sparse rewards.
dcterms:title: ViZDoom Deathmatch

dcterms:creator: S. Milani
N. Topin
B. Houghton
W. H. Guss
S. P. Mohanty
K. Nakata
O. Vinyals
N. S. Kuno
dcterms:description: MineRL ObtainDiamond is an environment built in Minecraft where the goal is to obtain a diamond by collecting and crafting prerequisite items. The task presents challenges such as sparse rewards and complex state-action spaces.
dcterms:title: MineRL ObtainDiamond

dcterms:creator: K. Kurach
A. Raichuk
P. Sta´nczyk
M. Zajac
O. Bachem
dcterms:description: Google Research Football is a 3D RL environment that simulates an 11 versus 11 football game with standard rules. The environment presents challenges such as sparse rewards and complex action and observation spaces.
dcterms:title: Google Research Football (GFootball)
